EXCEPTIONS.INTERNAL_ERROR: Woops, we got an error in the backend, please try again. If it keeps failing please check the logs for more details.
EXCEPTIONS.TOKEN_FAILED: Getting Emby token failed. Please check your credentials and address.
EXCEPTIONS.EMBY_CALL_FAILED: Call to Emby server failed, please check if emby is running and if the credentials are still correct.

FORM_ERRORS.NAME_REQUIRED: Geef uw naam of bijnaam op.
FORM_ERRORS.EMBYADDRESS_REQUIRED: Vul uw Emby adres ip in.
FORM_ERRORS.EMBYUSERNAME_REQUIRED: Vul uw Emby admin gebruikersnaam in.

WIZARD.INTROTEXT:
Welkom op de EmbyStat server wizard.

Met deze wizard gaan we de basic instellingen klaar zetten voor gebruik zodat u EmbyStat kunt beginnen gebruiken zonder koppijn. Wanneer de wizard klaar is kan u alle features van de server in gebruik nemen. Als u later de server verder wilt instellen kan u altijd naar de instellingen pagina gaan.

Voor nu is het genoeg om te weten hoe we u kunnen noemen en wat uw gewenste UI taal is.
WIZARD.EMBYNOTFOUNDTEXT: Now we will setup your Emby connection. We tried to auto detect your Emby server in the network but we failed. Can you please provide us with your emby IP/domain and fill in the rest of the form.
WIZARD.EMBYFOUNDTEXT: We found an Emby server in your network and entered the IP address already in the form. Feel free to adjust this and fill in the rest of the form.
WIZARD.PLUGININSTALLED: EmbyStat plugin found on Emby server
WIZARD.SAVINGINSTRUCTIONS: If something fails, you can't start using EmbyStat. In that case, fix the errors, press back and next.
WIZARD.FINISHED: All settings are saved and you can start using Emby server now. Enjoy your new statistics!

CONFIGURATION.MOVIETOSHORTTEXT: To find the movies that are suspisiously short we need to know what the amount of minutes you find to short for a movie. Default this is set to 10 minutes but you can change it if needed.

TASKS.PINGEMBYSERVERDESCRIPTION: Ping the Emby server to check if he is still online.
TASKS.SMALLEMBYSYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform a small sync with Emby server. This is a fast and small system update only.
TASKS.MEDIASYNCDESCRIPTION: Perform an incremental sync for your movie collection. This can take some time to run!
